title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text and data items
description: Datetime values retrieved from a table are showing different formats in dynamic text and data items.
OB: When datetime values are retrieved from a table and displayed in dynamic text and data items, they are shown in different formats.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Display the datetime values in a dynamic text item.
3. Display the datetime values in a data item.
4. Compare the formats of the datetime values in both items.
